overview: Bachelor Jack Towers has a problem. He doesn't understand women, but what man does? Jack is in for the 'shock' of his life though, when he finds that after a fluke accident that he can read women's minds. At first this new found 'gift' overwhelms Jack, but then he begins to realize that he can use it for his own benefit. When Jack's old college flame Lindsey steps back into his life, Jack uses his new found skill to win her affection. In spite of his best efforts to deny his growing feelings for Lindsey, Jack soon finds himself falling in love with Lindsey all over again. And it isn't long before — through the love of Lindsey — that he comes to understand what it is that women desire.
tagline: If it's the truth, then it's a shock!
title: Shocking Truth
